pages.text: It is crucial to note that Vault Hunters has changed a few things in Vanilla, and most mods require 'beating' Vanilla before even starting.  (There are exceptions, such as Quark.)
All vanilla armor has had its armor value nerfed, and its armor toughness has been removed.

pages.title: Healing Potions
pages.text: Unfortunately, the recipe does NOT sync properly on servers.  Potions of healing require a $(item)Golden Apple$()
